# Mode function which will be used throught the HW.
```{r}
Mode <- function(x) {
  ux <- unique(x)
  ux[which.max(tabulate(match(x, ux)))]
}
```


# 1a. Let U follow Uniform(a,b) Use simulations to numerically estimate the median and the mode of U for a = 0 and b = 2. 

```{r}
#set seed
set.seed(99)

uniform_values = runif(100, min = 0, max = 2)

median(uniform_values)
Mode(uniform_values)
```
# 2a. Use R to numerically estimate the median and the mode of X~Expo(2)

```{r}
set.seed(99)

expo_values = rexp(100, rate = 2)

median(expo_values)
Mode(expo_values)
```
